programme.title: Full Metal Jacket (1987)
programme.desc: Stanley Kubricks saga follows a group of Marines from boot camp to combat in Vietnam during the 1968 Tet Offensive.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Covert CIA agent Martian is called back to London Station. An incident in Belarus puts Bosko and Henry on a collision course with Langley. Danny learns a lesson. Someone unexpectedly reappears in Martians life. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Dr. Blake arrives from Langley and is put to a test by Martian and Henry. A spooked source threatens to put an operation at risk. Dannys cover is put in play. Martian, overtaken by events, begins to question Samis motives.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049 (2017)
programme.desc: In 2049 LA, a cop known as K hunts down android labourers who have gone rogue. But when he uncovers a shocking conspiracy involving the robots, K searches for the one person who might have answers: a law-enforcement agent who once had his job.

programme.title: Margaux (2022)
programme.desc: Eager for a weekend getaway of parties and relaxation, a group of twentysomethings rents a smart home vacation rental. Yet the homes sophisticated artificial intelligence programming system soon takes control, forcing the friends to fight their way out or face their end.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You (2014)
programme.desc: An adaptation of Jonathan Troppers novel surrounding a dysfunctional family reunion following their fathers funeral.

programme.title: Days of Thunder (1990)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise guns the engine in this action drama about a stock-car racer.

programme.title: Her (2013)
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computers operating system, which has the voice of a woman and the ability to grow and learn. Their relationship quickly turns more intimate, but in time their differences begin to outweigh their similarities. Meanwhile, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa (2006)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone wrote, directed and stars in this sixth go-round in the ring cycle, in which the never-say-die Philadelphia palooka comes out of retirement to fight reigning champ Mason "The Line" Dixon.

programme.title: Dead for a Dollar (2022)
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: Braveheart (1995)
programme.desc: A fictionalised portrait of 13th-century Scottish rebel William Wallace, who led insurgents against oppressive English rule.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Covert CIA agent Martian is called back to London Station. An incident in Belarus puts Bosko and Henry on a collision course with Langley. Danny learns a lesson. Someone unexpectedly reappears in Martians life. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Dr. Blake arrives from Langley and is put to a test by Martian and Henry. A spooked source threatens to put an operation at risk. Dannys cover is put in play. Martian, overtaken by events, begins to question Samis motives.

programme.title: Braveheart (1995)
programme.desc: A fictionalised portrait of 13th-century Scottish rebel William Wallace, who led insurgents against oppressive English rule.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa (2006)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone wrote, directed and stars in this sixth go-round in the ring cycle, in which the never-say-die Philadelphia palooka comes out of retirement to fight reigning champ Mason "The Line" Dixon.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A young lawyer discovers the firm hes hired into is controlled by the mob and attempts to escape from their clutches.

programme.title: Foxcatcher (2014)
programme.desc: Docudrama about millionaire John du Pont, who fatally shot Olympic gold-medal wrestler Dave Schultz and proceeded to lock himself in his mansion for two days as the police attempted to negotiate with him.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: A team of high-class thieves set out to avenge their mentors death with the help of his daughter. The plan consists of them stealing a fortune in gold, having it pilfered from them and then trying to get it back.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood (2007)
programme.desc: An opportunistic, self-made oil tycoon transforms into a corrupt businessman in this turn-of-the-20th-century story about money and greed.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Covert CIA agent Martian is called back to London Station. An incident in Belarus puts Bosko and Henry on a collision course with Langley. Danny learns a lesson. Someone unexpectedly reappears in Martians life. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Dr. Blake arrives from Langley and is put to a test by Martian and Henry. A spooked source threatens to put an operation at risk. Dannys cover is put in play. Martian, overtaken by events, begins to question Samis motives.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies, and the FBI (2024)
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter. Layering unexpected subjects, director Chris Moukarbel explores the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture interwoven with an affair between Cuspert and the FBI translator assigned to investigate him.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder (Brian Tee), mad scientist Baxter Stockman (Tyler Perry), Bebop (Gary Anthony Williams), Rocksteady (Stephen "Sheamus" Farrelly) and the notorious Krang (Brad Garrett).

programme.title: Unidentified Objects
programme.desc: Convinced she's made contact with an advanced alien society, free-spirited sex worker Winona pays sharp-witted curmudgeon Peter to share his car on a border-defying road trip bound for her abduction.

programme.title: The Last Voyage of the Demeter
programme.desc: The crew of the merchant ship Demeter sets sail from Carpathia to London to deliver a cargo of 50 unmarked wooden crates. However, they soon discover they're not alone as Dracula's unholy presence turns the trip into a nightmarish fight for survival.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Terror strikes when astronauts (Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds) aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life-form from Mars that threatens Earth.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A couple and their three sons encounter terror, courage and compassion following the December 2004 tsunami that devastated Thailand.

programme.title: Sleeping With Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand, a man (Jason Sudeikis) and a woman (Alison Brie) run into each other and try to maintain a platonic relationship despite their mutual attraction.

programme.title: What Breaks the Ice
programme.desc: Two teenage girls from different worlds form an unlikely friendship in the sweltering summer heat of 1998, but their fun and carefree days turn cold when they find themselves at the center of a mysterious murder.

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks drive to a secluded cafe for a big score.

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: A boy (Freddie Highmore) enters the realm of tiny beings and seeks a treasure that can save his grandmother's home.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Desperate to meet women and open their own dance club, brainless brothers Steve (Will Ferrell) and Doug Butabi (Chris Kattan) cruise Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Echo in the Canyon
programme.desc: A look at how musical groups such as The Byrds, The Beach Boys, Buffalo Springfield, and The Mamas & the Papas birthed the beginnings of the Laurel Canyon music scene and how the echo of these artists' creations reverberated across the world.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Liam, an aspiring young writer, eagerly accepts a tutoring position at the family estate of his idol, renowned author J.M. Sinclair. However, Liam realizes he is ensnared in a web of family secrets and resentment.

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A call girl (Rebecca De Mornay) helps a Princeton applicant (Tom Cruise) turn his home into a one-night brothel.

programme.title: Varsity Blues
programme.desc: When the star quarterback is injured, a rigid high-school football coach expects an irreverent player to lead the team to victory.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: JFK, LBJ, Vietnam, Watergate and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man (Tom Hanks) with an IQ of 75.

programme.title: Aftersun
programme.desc: Years after their last vacation, Sophie reflects on the rare time spent with her loving, idealistic father, attempting to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't.

programme.title: The Inspection
programme.desc: Based on the incredible true story of a gay Black man with few options who joins the Marines to prove himself to his estranged mother and triumph in a system that cast him aside, unexpectedly finding strength and camaraderie in this new community.

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: Facing the loss of her home and siblings if she fails, a gutsy teenager sets out on a dangerous quest to learn the fate of her missing father.

programme.title: The Wrath of Becky
programme.desc: When a violent group known as the Noble Men breaks into Becky's house and takes her beloved dog, she must return to her old ways to protect herself and her loved ones.

programme.title: Kokomo City
programme.desc: Four Black transgender sex workers tell their life stories in intimate and candid interviews.

programme.title: Deadly Cuts
programme.desc: Hair stylists in a working-class Dublin hair salon become accidental vigilantes and community heroes as they take on the gang members and gentrifiers threatening their community.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A CIA bookworm (Robert Redford) reports mayhem to his boss (Cliff Robertson), then hides out with a woman (Faye Dunaway) and sees a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher, living alone in the wake of a tragedy, attempts to reconnect with his teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: She's All That
programme.desc: A cool teen (Freddie Prinze Jr.) bets a friend that he can transform the school's geekiest girl (Rachael Leigh Cook) into a prom queen.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: A chef (Jon Favreau) quits his job at a prestigious Los Angeles restaurant and starts a food-truck business in Miami with his ex-wife (Sofa Vergara), his best friend (John Leguizamo) and his son.

programme.title: The Whale
programme.desc: A reclusive English teacher, living alone in the wake of a tragedy, attempts to reconnect with his teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

programme.title: Treasure
programme.desc: A music journalist accompanies her father, a charmingly stubborn Holocaust survivor, on a journey to his homeland. While she's eager to make sense of her family's past, her dad has an agenda of his own.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father's last request forces four grown siblings to live together for a week under one roof, they confront their turbulent history and tattered relationships.

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: A veteran actress (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself when she agrees to take part in a revival of the play that launched her career 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: Saved from death by a band of diminutive highway robbers, an exiled princess (Lily Collins) vows to win back her kingdom from an evil queen (Julia Roberts).

programme.title: A Promise
programme.desc: In the early 20th century, a love triangle forms between an ailing factory owner, his young bride and his protege.

programme.title: Home Again

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Men reminisce about intriguing sisters, whose parents (James Woods, Kathleen Turner) quarantined them after one of the five killed herself.

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: An impossible love blooms across two time periods and continents.

programme.title: Lucky Them
programme.desc: A wealthy aspiring filmmaker (Thomas Haden Church) accompanies a rock journalist (Toni Collette) as she searches for her former lover, a music legend she helped discover but who suddenly disappeared one night.

programme.title: Mafia Mamma
programme.desc: A mild-mannered suburban mom unexpectedly inherits her late grandfather's mafia empire in Italy. Guided by the firm's trusted consigliere, she hilariously defies everyone's expectations as she finds herself stuck in the middle of a deadly mob war.

programme.title: Detained
programme.desc: A woman wakes up in a police interrogation room with no memory of the night prior. Something does not seem quite right in this police station.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: A lawyer (Richard Gere) handles the cases of two murderous women (Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rene Zellweger) who are looking to gain celebrity from their public exposure.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: Aspiring photographer Therese spots the beautiful, elegant Carol perusing the doll displays in a 1950s Manhattan department store. The two women develop a fast bond that becomes a love with complicated consequences.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life.

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: An impossible love blooms across two time periods and continents.

programme.title: North of Normal
programme.desc: Raised in the wilderness, Cea Sunrise Person navigates a complicated relationship with her pot-smoking mother while seeking some semblance of normalcy.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sinad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: An old-money Harvard man Oliver (Ryan O'Neal) woos and weds a no-money music student (Ali MacGraw) from the wrong side of the tracks.

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A woman (Greta Gerwig) falls in love with a married man (Ethan Hawke), then devises a strategy to reunite him with his former wife (Julianne Moore) three years later.

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: Family wounds are healed by a Southerner's (Nick Nolte) affair with his suicidal sister's New York psychiatrist (Barbra Streisand).

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: It Could Happen to You
programme.desc: A New York policeman (Nicolas Cage) keeps his promise to split a $4 million lottery prize with a waitress (Bridget Fonda), but his wife objects.

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: The mutual attraction between a federal marshal (Jennifer Lopez) and an escaped convict (George Clooney) interferes with their goals.

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting one another.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor (Tom Cruise) explores his relationship with his wife (Nicole Kidman) by delving into a sensual underworld.
